text: On the FAQ page, the table of contents is missing.

creator: nettings@apache.org
text:
the easy way out would be to use <section/>s - then the toc is generated
automatically. but in the faq, there are <faq> and <answer/> elements, and i'm
always reluctant to go from more semantics to less... can anyone implement a toc
feature for faqs easily?
The problem is in the forrest code but I am on the case.
creator: thorsten@apache.org
